item.description:
We love celebrating our members' passions & manifestations.

Antonio Faillace, a BostonLOA member and founder of AuthorsGlobe, is partnering with More Than Words in Waltham to kick off its first "Conversations on the Edge" series on Conscious Leadership. The featured speaker is Dr. Raj Sisodia.

Our LoA community advocates living a life following passion and purpose. By extension, we can evolve to become Conscious Leaders, facilitating a harmony of interests, rather than on personal gain and self-aggrandizement.

Dr. Raj Sisodia shares his insights re: how you as a Conscious Leader can be abundant while being true to your passion and purpose. You'll also have the opportunity to network and connect with other “Conscious” leaders.

So, what's with the book donation?

AuthorsGlobe, in the spirit of being a Conscious Company, believe in giving back and investing "Time, Talent and Treasure" in social educational ventures. It currently supports More Than Words, an award-winning non-profit organization that empowers at-risk youth by letting them run a bookstore and online business.

So, when you come to the event, your donation of gently used books (if you have any), is much appreciated in helping the youths run a successful bookstore.

(1) Here on our event page, so we'll be on the look out for you.
(2) Register also at http://mtwconsciousle... since space is limited.

Topic: How Businesses Profit from Passion & Purpose

Description: At this time of economic upheaval, we have the opportunity to re-think the role and purpose of business in supporting society. Corporate Social Responsibility is nothing new but a broad change is underway in the nature of leadership & capitalism itself.

Learn in this thought-provoking conversation:

- New Conscious Leadership skills that empower executives and their companies to deliver 9 times better results

- How corporations like Google, IKEA, Starbucks, and Timberland live up to their promise of serving all stakeholders and consistently outperform the market

- How to increase your "share of heart": delivering the emotional, experiential, and social values your stakeholders are demanding.

About the Speaker:

Dr. Rajendra S. Sisodia is the Professor of Marketing at Bentley University and Chairman of the Conscious Capitalism Institute. His book "Firms of Endearment: How World Class Companies Profit from Passion and Purpose" was named by Amazon.com and others as one of the 10 best business books of 2007, and has been translated into seven languages. Dr. Sisodia is committed to bringing the conscious capitalism movement to businesses of all sizes and currently serves on the Advisory Board of MIT start-up, AuthorsGlobe.

Dr. Sisodia has published nearly 100 articles in journals such as Harvard Business Review, Journal of Marketing, Journal of Business Strategy and Journal of Business Research. He also writes frequently for the Wall Street Journal. His research, teaching, and consulting expertise spans the areas of strategic marketing, marketing productivity, marketing ethics, and stakeholder-based marketing. His clients have included IBM, Volvo, Nokia and AT&T.

An electrical engineer from BITS, Pilani (India), Dr. Sisodia has an MBA in Marketing from the Bajaj Institute of Management Studies in Bombay, and a Ph. D. in Marketing & Business Policy from Columbia University, where he was the Booz Allen Hamilton Fellow.

About More Than Words:
More Than Words is a social enterprise that empowers at-risk youth to take charge of their lives by taking charge of a business.


About AuthorsGlobe:
AuthorsGlobe is an award-winning MIT start-up that educates, empowers & connects a global community with Visionary Thinkers from MIT, Harvard, NY Times best-selling authors and industry experts. It is also a founding member of the Conscious Entrepreneur Collaborative. We look forward to seeing you at our upcoming Virtual MasterClasses.
